  • Function reference
  • Changelog

    Broadcast to other ranks and swap temperatures with any of them

    pbdMPI_bcast_reduce_temperatures.Rd

    Using this function, at most two ranks will swap.

    Usage

    pbdMPI_bcast_reduce_temperatures(i, B, LL, H, r, comm, cs)

    Arguments

    i

    MCMC iteration

    B

    inverse temperature (parallel tempering)

    LL

    log-likelihood value of current point

    H

    algorithm's step size (often called epsilon in literature)

    r

    MPI rank

    comm

    MPI communicator

    cs

    MPI comm size

    Details

    Given a current log-likelihood, temperature and step-size, this funcion will broadcast a log-likelihood value to all other ranks and they can each decide to swap temperatures with the root process. Root is cycled around all ranks (round-robin).

    Each other rank is allowed to make the offer to swap. The root process decides which rank to swap with.

    On this page

    Developed by Alexandra Jauhiainen, Olivia Eriksson, Federica Milinanni, Andrei Kramer.
